name: Bulgogi
description: Bulgogi is a classic Korean dish featuring thinly sliced marinated beef, grilled to perfection. Served with a side of kimchi and steamed rice, it's a sweet and savory delight.

name: Bibimbap
description: Bibimbap is a colorful Korean rice bowl topped with a variety of vegetables, marinated beef, a fried egg, and gochujang sauce. It's a harmonious blend of flavors and textures.

name: Kimchi Jjigae
description: Kimchi Jjigae is a spicy and hearty Korean stew made with fermented kimchi, tofu, and pork. It's a comforting and traditional dish, best enjoyed with a bowl of steamed rice.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Tteokbokki is a popular Korean street food dish made with chewy rice cakes, spicy gochujang sauce, fish cakes, and hard-boiled eggs. It's a spicy and satisfying treat.

name: Japchae
description: Japchae is a delightful Korean noodle dish made with sweet potato glass noodles stir-fried with vegetables, beef, and a soy-based sauce. It's a harmonious blend of sweet and savory flavors.

name: Korean BBQ Galbi
description: Korean BBQ Galbi features marinated short ribs grilled to perfection. The meat is tender, flavorful, and slightly sweet, making it a favorite at Korean BBQ restaurants.

name: Doenjang Jjigae
description: Doenjang Jjigae is a rich and savory Korean soybean paste stew with tofu, vegetables, and sometimes seafood. It's a beloved comfort food in Korea.

name: Korean Spicy Fried Chicken
description: Korean Spicy Fried Chicken is crispy and coated in a fiery gochujang-based sauce. It's a popular dish in Korean fried chicken restaurants, known for its addictive heat.

name: Haemul Pajeon
description: Haemul Pajeon is a Korean seafood pancake made with green onions and a variety of seafood such as shrimp and squid. It's a savory and crispy delicacy.

name: Bingsu
description: Bingsu is a popular Korean dessert made with shaved ice, sweet toppings like red beans or fruit, and drizzled with condensed milk. It's a delightful way to cool down on a hot day.
